info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 08 at 3:13AM MST until January 08 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. * WHERE...Espanola Valley, Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass, and Santa Fe Metro Area. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow packed or icy road conditions. This includes portions of I-25. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.
